buddhism.title: Four Noble Truths
buddhism.objective: Name and explain the four truths.
buddhism.exercise: Journal: where do you notice craving pushing you today?

buddhism.title: Eightfold Path (View & Intention)
buddhism.exercise: Write one wholesome intention for tomorrow.

buddhism.title: Mindfulness in Daily Life
buddhism.objective: Apply mindfulness to a routine task.
buddhism.exercise: Wash dishes or brush teeth with full attention for 3 minutes.

buddhism.title: Loving‑Kindness
buddhism.exercise: For 2 minutes: 'May I be safe… may others be safe.'

buddhism.title: Impermanence
buddhism.objective: Recognize change in body and mind.
buddhism.exercise: Note 3 things that changed today, pleasant or not.

zen.title: Posture & Ordinary Mind
zen.exercise: Sit 5 minutes; label thoughts 'planning', 'remembering', then return.

zen.title: Koans as Pointers
zen.objective: Relate to a koan without solving.

zen.title: Everyday Suchness
zen.objective: Notice the Way in ordinary acts.
zen.exercise: Choose one meal to eat without phone; just taste and chew.

zen.title: Letting Go
zen.exercise: Exhale fully and soften the belly; let the shoulders drop.

zen.title: Form & Emptiness
zen.exercise: Notice the space around sounds for one minute.
